title: St. Therese of Lisieux Rose Novena - Little Flower Prayers

days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

O Little Therese of the Child Jesus, please pick for me a rose from the heavenly garden and send it to me as a message of love.  O Little Flower of Jesus, ask God to grant the favors I now place with confidence in your hands:  (mention your special prayer request here)  St. Therese, help me to always believe as you did, in God’s great love for me, so that I may imitate your “Little Way” each day.
